title: Nosocomial Transmission of Emerging Viruses via Aerosol-Generating Medical Procedures

title: Enhanced Hygiene Measures and Norovirus Transmission during an Outbreak
text: No quantitative estimates exist of the results of such enhanced hygiene measures on reducing further transmission of norovirus
authors: Heijne, Janneke C.M.; Teunis, Peter; Morroy, Gabriella; Wijkmans, Clementine; Oostveen, Sandy; Duizer, Erwin; Kretzschmar, Mirjam; Wallinga, Jacco

title: Quantifying the transmission potential of pandemic influenza
text:
One line of addressing heterogeneous patterns of transmission using the observed data is separating household transmission from community transmission
 In future studies, influenza models may better to highlight the increasing importance of considering household transmission to estimate the transmission potential using the temporal distribution of infection events
